extendedIngredients.name: cantaloupe
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 medium cantaloupe, peeled, seeded and cubed

recipes.title: Chilled Cantaloupe Soup
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                Place cantaloupe and 1/2 cup orange juice in a blender or food processor; cover and process until smooth.                                                                                            Transfer to a large bowl; stir in lime juice, cinnamon and remaining orange juice. Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour. Serve with mint if desired.                                        Yield: 6 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Chilled Cantaloupe Soup in  Quick CookingJanuary/February 1999, p29                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             One 3/4-cup serving equals 70 calories, trace fat (0 saturated fat), 0 cholesterol, 9 mg sodium, 17 g carbohydrate, 0 fiber, 1 g protein. Diabetic Exchanges: 1 fruit.                                                                                                                                                                    Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: Place cantaloupe and 1/2 cup orange juice in a blender or food processor; cover and process until smooth.
Transfer to a large bowl; stir in lime juice, cinnamon and remaining orange juice. Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour.
